name: Crawfish Etouffee IV
author: Jason Poche
summary: This is a quick and very good Cajun dish that was given to me by my mother.
ingredients: ½ cup diced green bell pepper
3 (10.75 ounce) cans  condensed cream of mushroom soup
1 (10 ounce) can diced tomatoes with green chile peppers
directions: In an 8 quart stock pot over medium heat, add vegetable oil and margarine
Saute onions, green pepper and garlic until onions are translucent
Add crawfish to the onion mixture, and cook for 5 minutes
Add a little water to keep crawfish moist while cooking
Stir in soup and diced tomatoes
Bring to a boil and simmer for 30 minutes
Sprinkle in parsley after about 10 minutes
Salt and pepper to taste while simmering
Water can be added to thin as desired
